balanceOf(address,uint256).details: See {IERC1155-balanceOf}. Requirements: - `account` cannot be the zero address.

balanceOfBatch(address[],uint256[]).details: See {IERC1155-balanceOfBatch}. Requirements: - `accounts` and `ids` must have the same length.

burn(address,address,uint256).details: mint some amount of tokens. Only callable by token owner

mint(address,address,uint256).details: mint some amount of tokens. Only callable by token owner

paused().details: Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise.

setOperator(address).details: Set the address allowed to mint and burn

supportsInterface(bytes4).details: See {IERC165-supportsInterface}. Time complexity O(1), guaranteed to always use less than 30 000 gas.

totalBalances(uint256).details: Returns the total balance minted of this type

uri(uint256).details: Returns the metadata URI for this token type
